name: Midnight Rose Elixir
description: A captivating blend of dark roses, black currant, and mysterious oud that evokes the essence of a moonlit garden. This intoxicating fragrance opens with the fresh burst of bergamot and pink pepper, leading to a heart of velvety rose petals and jasmine. The base notes of sandalwood, patchouli, and amber create a warm, sensual finish that lingers on the skin for hours. Perfect for evening wear and special occasions.

specifications.ingredients: Alcohol, Fragrance, Water, Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycol

careInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight
Keep the cap tightly closed when not in use
Avoid contact with eyes and sensitive areas
Keep out of reach of children

faq.question: How long does the fragrance last?
faq.answer: Midnight Rose Elixir typically lasts 8-12 hours on the skin, depending on your skin type and application method. The fragrance is designed to be long-lasting and will develop beautifully throughout the day.

faq.question: Is this perfume suitable for sensitive skin?
faq.answer: While our perfumes are formulated with high-quality ingredients, we recommend doing a patch test if you have sensitive skin. The fragrance contains natural and synthetic ingredients that are generally well-tolerated.

faq.question: Can this be worn by both men and women?
faq.answer: Yes, Midnight Rose Elixir is a unisex fragrance designed to complement both masculine and feminine styles. The rose and oud combination creates a sophisticated scent that works beautifully for everyone.

faq.question: What's the difference between Eau de Parfum and Eau de Toilette?
faq.answer: Eau de Parfum has a higher concentration of fragrance oils (15-20%) compared to Eau de Toilette (5-15%), making it more intense and longer-lasting. Our Elixir series uses the highest concentration for maximum impact.

faq.question: How should I apply the perfume?
faq.answer: Apply to pulse points like wrists, neck, and behind the ears. Start with 2-3 sprays and adjust based on your preference. The fragrance will develop and become more complex as it warms on your skin.
